description_en:
**ISISPHARMA UVEBLOCK SPF50+ Dry Touch Ultra-Fluid 40ml** is your perfect sun protection ally. This dry-touch sunscreen absorbs quickly (within 30 seconds), offering broad-spectrum protection against UVA, UVB, and infrared rays. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive and oily skin, it helps prevent premature wrinkles. Featuring the patented SUNSTRESS PROTECT complex, it preserves and stimulates the skin's natural defense mechanisms.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA UVEBLOCK SPF50+ Dry Touch Ultra-Fluid 40ml**:
â­ Apply to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.

description_en:
**Isispharma Teen Derm Gel Sensitive For Oily Skin 400 ml** is a gentle cleansing gel suitable for sensitive, imperfection-prone skin. It contains 5 active ingredients that purify, soothe, and regulate excess sebum, leaving your skin feeling fresh and non-greasy. Clinically proven to remove impurities and reduce excess sebum by 90%, soothe skin by 89%, and improve skin texture by 91% after just one month. **Isispharma Teen Derm Gel Sensitive For Oily Skin 400 ml** is suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding women.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Isispharma Teen Derm Gel Sensitive For Oily Skin 400 ml**: 
â­ Apply morning and evening to moistened face, neck, and back.
â­ Gently massage, then rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Isispharma Teen Derm Gel Sensitive For Oily Skin 400 ml**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Peg- 90 Glyceryl Isostearate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Propanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Chlorphenesin, Laureth-2, Citric Acid, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Tetrasodium Edta, Zinc Pca, Xylitylglucoside, Buteth-3, Anhydroxylitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Xylitol, Alcohol, Butyl Avocadate, Dipropylene Glycol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Propolis Extract, Tributyl Citrate, Boswellia Serrata Resin Extract, Ci 42090 (Blue 1), Propyl Gallate

description_en:
**Isispharma Secalia Ato Soothing Lipid-Restoring Balm - 400ml** is the 1st fast-penetrating fluid balm designed to repair and soothe your skin barrier, reducing discomfort, dryness, and the frequency and intensity of itching. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Isispharma Secalia Ato Soothing Lipid-Restoring Balm - 400ml**: 
â­ Gently massage onto your skin once or twice daily, especially on very dry and sensitive areas.
â­ Apply to clean, dry skin.
â­ Suitable for all ages, including newborns.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Isispharma Secalia Ato Soothing Lipid-Restoring Balm - 400ml**: (This list will be updated later)

â­ Long-lasting hydration (+46% hydration after 24h).
â­ Half as much itching after 14 days of use.
â­ Instant relief for 90% of patients.
â­ No greasy, sticky film for 95% of patients.
â­ Suitable for the whole family, even babies.
â­ Light texture, gentle on the skin, fast-absorbing, and non-sticky.

**ISISPHARMA Urelia Exfoliating Cleansing Gel 200ml** is an exfoliating and cleansing gel for face, body and hair, enriched with 10% Urea.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Urelia Exfoliating Cleansing Gel 200ml**:
â­ For face and body: Apply 1-2 times daily to wet skin, lather gently and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For scalp: Use 2-3 times a week on wet hair, leave for 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ISISPHARMA Urelia Exfoliating Cleansing Gel 200ml**:
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Phenoxyethanol-free.
â­ Soap-free.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Dermatologically tested.

**Product Features:**
â­ Cleanses efficiently.
â­ Eliminates scales.
â­ Moisturizes and soothes discomfort.
â­ Prepares skin for specific treatments.

description_en:
**ISISPHARMA Secalia AHA Exfoliating Emollient Milk 200ml** is the perfect solution for dry, scaly skin. This unique milk combines deep hydration and gentle exfoliation to restore your skin's radiance and softness.

â­ Removes scales and prevents their reappearance.
â­ Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin.
â­ Suitable for treating keratosis pilaris (chicken skin), dry knees and elbows, and psoriasis.
â­ Rich in glycolic acid and lactic acid.
â­ Contains nourishing oils that regenerate skin cells.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Secalia AHA Exfoliating Emollient Milk 200ml**:
â­ Apply 1 to 2 times a week to clean, dry skin in affected areas.
â­ Use a suitable sunscreen on sun-exposed areas.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ISISPHARMA Secalia AHA Exfoliating Emollient Milk 200ml**:
â­ Glycolic Acid
â­ Lactic Acid
â­ Nourishing Oils

**ISISPHARMA Uveblock SPF50+ Light Teinte 40ml** is a lightweight tinted fluid sunscreen with a light foundation, providing high protection against harmful sun rays (SPF 50+). It absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy residue, and helps gently conceal skin imperfections.  Specifically designed for sensitive skin, it's suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ISISPHARMA Uveblock SPF50+ Light Teinte 40ml**:
â­ Apply to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming, exercising, or sweating.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

**Batiste Dry Shampoo Cherry 200 ml** is your go-to solution for instantly great-looking hair! For over 30 years, Batiste has been the UKâ€™s #1 Dry Shampoo brand. This fast-acting, easy-to-use dry shampoo gives you gorgeous, stylish hair in a flash.

â­ Brush and style your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Batiste Dry Shampoo Cherry 200 ml**:

description_en:
**Parachute Gold Hair Oil** is a unique blend of timeless Indian wisdom and modern science, designed to strengthen and thicken your hair. â­ Nourishes the scalp and repairs dryness with antioxidants and Vitamin E. â­ Forms a protective layer around the hair to prevent further damage. â­ Contains cocolipids from coconut oil to repair and strengthen damaged hair from within. â­ Stimulates dormant hair follicles to increase hair growth, resulting in shinier, thicker hair. â­ Increases hair elasticity and strengthens roots. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Gold Hair Oil**: 
â­ Brush your hair before applying the oil. â­ Pour a teaspoon onto your palms and rub. â­ Massage your scalp thoroughly with your fingertips. â­ Distribute the oil through the lengths of your hair. â­ Massage for 10-15 minutes. â­ Leave for at least 30 minutes (or overnight, but no more than 24 hours). â­ Shampoo your hair thoroughly. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parachute Gold Hair Oil**: 
â­ Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil â­ Mineral Oil â­ Cocoglycerides â­ Phytantriol â­ Butylated Hydroxy Toluene â­ C.I. 47000 â­ C.I. 26100

description_en:
**Parachute Hair Oil For Strong Hair 300 Ml** is the secret to beautiful hair! A blend of essential natural ingredients for beautiful, thick, and long hair. Coconut oil maintains healthy hair and restores its shine, while almond oil and hibiscus strengthen and thicken your hair. It repairs damage from within and gives you noticeable shine and thickness. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Hair Oil For Strong Hair 300 Ml**:
â­ Brush your hair before applying the oil.
â­ Pour a teaspoon onto your palms and rub.
â­ Massage thoroughly into your scalp using circular motions.
â­ Distribute the oil through the lengths of your hair.
â­ Massage for 10-15 minutes, comb, and tie your hair.
â­ Leave for at least 30 minutes (not more than 24 hours).
â­ Shampoo your hair thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parachute Hair Oil For Strong Hair 300 Ml**:
â­ Cocos nucifera oil
â­ Mineral oil
â­ Cinnamomum camphora
â­ Butylated hydroxytoluene
â­ Prunus amygdalus Dulcis Oil
â­ Perfumes
â­ Hibiscus rose Sinensis extract

**Parachute Virgin Coconut Oil 500 ml** is a 100% natural oil that enhances the beauty and health of your hair and skin. It gives your hair shine, softness, and a silky touch, and treats split ends and strengthens hair follicles. As for your skin, it will gain softness and freshness thanks to its moisturizing and ideal properties. Use it as a pre- or post-wash hair treatment, or as a daily skin moisturizer. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Virgin Coconut Oil 500 ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your hair and scalp before washing for deep nourishment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parachute Virgin Coconut Oil 500 ml**:

It reduces breakage and damage, leaving hair incredibly soft and shiny. Its lightweight, non-sticky formula makes it ideal for use before or after washing your hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Advanced Coconut Hair Oil Keratin 300 ml**:

description_en:
**Parachute Coconut Oil** (Edible) 200ml is made from the finest, hand-picked sun-dried coconuts. This 100% pure and edible coconut oil boasts long-lasting freshness and a delightful nutty aroma. This multipurpose oil is perfect for cooking, hair care, and skincare.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Coconut Oil**:
â­ Brush your hair before applying the oil.
â­ Pour a teaspoon of oil into your palm and rub to distribute evenly.
â­ Gently massage your scalp with your fingertips.
â­ Apply more oil to the ends of your hair.
â­ Leave for at least 30 minutes, then shampoo and rinse.
â­ For skincare, apply a small amount to your face and massage gently.
â­ For cooking, use for frying, roasting, baking, or grilling.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parachute Coconut Oil**:
â­ 100% Pure Coconut Oil.

**Parachute Coconut Oil** is the ideal choice for hair and skin care, as well as cooking. It comes in a 200ml tamper-evident bottle, preserving its quality and freshness. Licensed by FSSAI as an edible grade coconut oil. 
#Parachute #CoconutOil #HairCare #SkinCare #Cooking #Recipe #Beauty #HealthyHair #HealthySkin #ParachuteProducts

**Parachute Coconut Oil**, 100% pure coconut oil, perfect for cooking, hair care, and skin care. Made from the finest sun-dried coconuts, it features a delicious coconut aroma and taste.  It has undergone 27 quality tests and 5 stages of purification, without any manual contamination. ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parachute Coconut Oil**:

â­ Use it on the skin as a natural moisturizer. 
â­ Use it in cooking.

description_en:
**Parodontax** toothpaste is specially designed to care for gums, breath, and sensitivity. â­ Scientifically proven to target gum problems, bad breath, and tooth sensitivity. â­ When bacteria builds up along the gum line, it can lead to gum problems. â­ Gum problems can lead to bad breath and the exposure of the tooth surface underneath, leaving it unprotected and vulnerable to sensitivity. â­ **Parodontax** Gum + Breath & Sensitivity is scientifically proven to help soothe gum problems caused by plaque while targeting bad breath and tooth sensitivity that gum problems can cause. â­ With continued use, it helps soothe gum problems and protects against bad breath and tooth sensitivity. â­ Fluoride toothpaste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax**: â­ Always follow label directions. â­ Brush twice a day and not more than three times, minimize swallowing, and spit out. â­ The ends of this carton have been glued down. Do not use if carton ends are open. â­ Do not use if the foil seal on the nozzle is broken. Remove the foil seal before use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax**: â­ Active Ingredient: Contains Stannous Fluoride 0.454% and Sodium Fluoride 0.0721% w/w (1426 ppm Fluoride).

#Parodontax #Toothpaste #Gums #Breath #Sensitivity #OralHealth #Teeth #OralCare #DentalCare #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Parodontax Gum Care Fresh Mouthwash** for healthy gums and a healthy mouth! It helps prevent gum problems by removing plaque around the gum line and between teeth. **Parodontax** is scientifically proven to keep gums healthy, targets plaque bacteria, and works between teeth and around the gum line.  It contains fluoride to strengthen teeth and added fresh breath protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax Gum Care Fresh Mouthwash**:
â­ Use as part of your daily oral care routine.
â­ Gentle on gums, and scientifically proven to keep gums and teeth healthy.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax Gum Care Fresh Mouthwash**:
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Mythelparaben, Probylparaben, Zin Chloride, Gallen Gum, o-cymen-5-ol, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, CI 17200.
â­ Active Ingredients: Contains Sodium Fluoride 0.0497%w/w (225ppm Fluoride).

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙˆØ¯ÙˆÙ†ØªÙƒØ³ ØºØ³ÙˆÙ„ ÙŠÙˆÙ…ÙŠ Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø«Ø© Ø§Ù†ØªØ¹Ø§Ø´ Ø²Ø§Ø¦Ø¯ - 300 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Parodontax Mouthwash Daily Gum Care Extra Fresh - 300 ml** is the perfect mouthwash to maintain healthy gums and teeth. It helps prevent plaque buildup and contributes to maintaining a healthy seal between gums and teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax Mouthwash Daily Gum Care Extra Fresh - 300 ml**:
â­ Use twice daily.
â­ Measure 10ml and rinse for one minute, then spit out.
â­ Do not rinse your mouth with water afterwards.
â­ Do not drink from the bottle.
â­ Do not swallow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax Mouthwash Daily Gum Care Extra Fresh - 300 ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil
â­ Sodium Citrate
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Propylparaben
â­ Zinc Chloride
â­ Gellan Gum
â­ o-cymen-5-ol
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ CI 17200

Keep out of reach of children. Not to be given to children under 6 years of age. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. If the seal on the cap is missing or not intact, do not use.
#Parodontax #Mouthwash #OralCare #GumHealth #HealthyTeeth #OralHygiene #HealthySmile #WhiteTeeth #BrightSmile #SaudiOralCare

description_en:
**Parodontax Mouthwash Extra 12 300ml** is specially formulated to help protect against gum problems when used alongside twice-daily brushing. Clinically proven to help remove plaque bacteria, it's alcohol-free and contains fluoride to help keep gums healthy and breath fresh.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax Mouthwash Extra 12 300ml**:
â­ Use twice daily after brushing with a fluoride toothpaste.
â­ Measure 10ml and rinse for one minute, then spit out.
â­ Do not swallow. Do not rinse with water after use.
â­ For oral use only. Not suitable for children under 12 years old.
â­ If irritation occurs, stop use immediately and consult a doctor.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax Mouthwash Extra 12 300ml**:
â­ Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aroma, Methylparaben, Chlorhexidine digluconate, Propylparaben, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Eugenol.

#Parodontax #Mouthwash #OralHealth #DentalCare #Gums #OralHygiene #PlaqueBacteria #Fluoride #GumHealth #SaudiArabia

shortdescription_en: Perfect gum protection with **Parodontax Mouthwash Extra 12**, alcohol-free mouthwash enriched with fluoride.

title_en: **Parodontax** Active Gum Repair Fresh Mint Toothpaste 75ml
title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙˆØ¯ÙˆÙ†ØªÙƒØ³** Ù…Ø¹Ø¬ÙˆÙ† Ø£Ø³Ù†Ø§Ù† ØªØ±Ù…ÙŠÙ… ÙØ¹Ø§Ù„ Ù„Ù„Ø«Ø© Ø¨Ù†Ø¹Ù†Ø§Ø¹ Ù…Ù†Ø¹Ø´ 75 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Parodontax** is a daily toothpaste formulated to help reverse signs of early gum damage by targeting plaque, the main cause of gum problems. The active ingredient kills plaque bacteria at the gum line to help keep the seal tight between gums and teeth and prevent early gum problems.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax**:
â­ Adults and children 2 years of age and older: Brush teeth thoroughly, preferably after each meal or at least twice a day, and not more than 3 times a day, or as directed by a dentist or doctor. Minimize swallowing. Spit out after brushing. To minimize swallowing for children under 6 years of age, use a pea-sized amount and supervise brushing and rinsing until good habits are established. Children under 2 years of age: Consult a dentist or doctor.

â­ Stop use and ask a dentist if: gingivitis, bleeding, or redness persists for more than 2 weeks. You have painful or swollen gums, pus from the gum line, loose teeth, or increasing spacing between the teeth. These may be signs or symptoms of periodontitis, a serious form of gum disease. Keep out of reach of children under 6 years of age. If more than used for brushing is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax**:
â­ Stannous fluoride 0.454% (0.15% w/v fluoride ion)

#Parodontax #Toothpaste #OralHealth #DentalCare #Gums #OralHygiene #HealthyTeeth #Plaque #Prevention #GumHealth #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Parodontax** Daily Gum Care Fresh Mint Mouthwash is your key to healthy gums and a confident smile.  **Parodontax** helps prevent gum problems by removing plaque around the gum line and between your teeth. It also provides fresh breath protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax**: 
â­ Rinse your mouth with 10ml of **Parodontax** for one minute, then spit it out. 
â­ Use with Parodontax toothpaste and toothbrush for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax**: 
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, PEG-60, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Zin Chloride, Gallen Gum, o-cymen-5-ol, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, CI 17200. 
â­ Active Ingredients: Contains Sodium Fluoride 0.0497%w/w (225ppm Fluoride).

description_en:
**Parodontax Toothbrush Soft Promo Pack (1+1) Free** is a super soft toothbrush, gentle on gums and teeth, yet tough on plaque.  It helps protect against gum problems and keep teeth strong. Featuring a combination of longer tapered and shorter rounded bristles that effectively reach along, above and below the gum line, and an ergonomically designed handle for comfortable use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax Toothbrush Soft Promo Pack (1+1) Free**:
â­ Use the **Parodontax Toothbrush Soft Promo Pack (1+1) Free** twice daily. 
â­ Brush your teeth using gentle, circular motions. 
â­ Replace your toothbrush every 3 months, or when bristles become frayed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax Toothbrush Soft Promo Pack (1+1) Free**:
â­ High-quality soft bristles. 
â­ Ergonomically designed comfortable handle.

description_en:
**Parodontax** Complete Protection Whitening Toothpaste helps keep your gums healthy and your teeth strong.  It features 8 specially designed benefits, including gently removing surface stains to help restore your teeth's natural whiteness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax**:
â­ Use twice daily as a daily toothpaste.
â­ Helps stop bleeding gums.
â­ Not suitable for children under 12 years of age.
â­ Brush twice a day, and not more than 3 times.
â­ Minimize swallowing and spit out.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax**:
â­ Sodium Bicarbonate
â­ Aqua
â­ Glycerin
â­ Hydrated Silica
â­ Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
â­ Aroma
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Sodium Saccharin
â­ Sodium Fluoride
â­ Titanium Dioxide
â­ Steviol Glycosides
â­ Limonene
â­ Cl 77491

**Parodontax Herbal Toothpaste 75ml**, a natural toothpaste with a refreshing herbal flavour. â­Contains mineral salts (sodium bicarbonate) clinically proven to help stop bleeding gums. â­Removes built-up bacteria. â­Leaves your mouth feeling clean and fresh. â­Unique flavour combination of ginger, eucalyptus and mint extracts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Parodontax Herbal Toothpaste 75ml**: 
â­Use **Parodontax Herbal Toothpaste 75ml** twice daily. â­Do not use more than three times a day. â­Not suitable for children under 12 years of age. â­Minimize swallowing. â­Brush thoroughly. â­Keep out of reach of children. â­Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Parodontax Herbal Toothpaste 75ml**:

description_en:
**Palmers Hair Cream Coconut 250 gm** is the ideal product for your hair care needs. Your hair constantly faces damaging factors such as pollution, heat, and poor hair care products, leading to roughness, dryness, and hair fall. **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut** is designed to restore shine and elasticity to your hair. A natural blend rich in nourishing herbal ingredients, it provides maximum protection and ease of use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut**: 
â­ Ensure your scalp is clean and dry.
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to your scalp and massage gently.
â­ Distribute the cream throughout your hair to the ends.
â­ Do not rinse after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut**: 
â­ Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum)
â­ Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina)
â­ Petrolatum
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Olive Oil
â­ Vegetable Oil (Olus)
â­ Lanolin
â­ Fragrance (Parfum)
â­ Benzyl Benzoate
â­ Coumarin

**Palmers Lotion Coco Butter Firming 250 ml** is the perfect solution for smooth, healthy skin. It treats dry skin, reduces the appearance of stretch marks, tightens skin, and boosts elasticity. Contains cocoa butter, shea butter, collagen, and elastin for instant smoothness and deep hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Lotion Coco Butter Firming**: 
â­ Gently massage the lotion onto your body. 
â­ Use a small amount to avoid waste. 
â­ Allow the lotion to absorb into the skin for maximum effectiveness. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Lotion Coco Butter Firming**: 
â­Water (Aqua), Mineral Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Stearic Acid, Isopropyl Myristate, Polymide-1, Propylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance (Parfum), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopheryl Acetate, Soluble Collagen, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Lecithin, Carnitine, Ubiquinone, Triethanolamine, Peg 40 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Acrylates Copolymer, Tetrasodium EDTA, Methylisothiazolinone, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Linalool.

description_en:
**Palmers Nipple Cream 30 gm** is the perfect cream for soothing and moisturizing sore nipples during breastfeeding.  It's formulated with pure Cocoa Butter and ProVitamin B5 Panthenol in a soothing emollient base, providing deep hydration and ultimate comfort. â­ Soothes and softens sore, cracked nipples. â­ Gentle on sensitive skin. â­ Dermatologically tested. â­ Easy to apply and quickly absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Nipple Cream**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of **Palmers Nipple Cream** to the nipple area after each feeding or as needed. â­ No need to wash off before breastfeeding. â­ Can be used prenatally to condition nipples. â­ Apply daily to keep nipples soft, supple, and moisturized.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Nipple Cream**: 
â­ Pure Cocoa Butter. â­ ProVitamin B5 Panthenol. â­ Soothing emollient base.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Hair Cream**:

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Hair Cream**:
â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, D, E.
â­ Contains nourishing proteins for hair.

description_en:
**Palmers Body Lotion Cocoa Butter Vitamin E 400 Ml**, a luxurious body lotion for skin care. â­ Made with rich natural ingredients, including cocoa butter, shea butter, and coconut oil. â­ Deeply moisturizes and softens skin for a silky smooth feel. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks. â­ Fast-absorbing and paraben-free & phthalate-free. â­ Protects skin from harmful sun rays. â­ Suitable for eczema-prone skin. â­ Provides 24-hour moisture. â­ Recommended by dermatologists. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Body Lotion Cocoa Butter Vitamin E 400 Ml**
â­ Use after a warm bath. â­ Pat skin dry. â­ Apply a generous amount and massage gently. â­ Let your skin breathe before dressing. â­ Use daily for healthy skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Body Lotion Cocoa Butter Vitamin E 400 Ml**
â­ Water (Aqua), Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Fragrance (Parfum), Glyceryl Stearate, Petrolatum, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Orange 4 (Ci 15510), Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Kernel Oil, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, PEG-8 Stearate, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Benzyl Alcohol.

#bodylotion #palmers #cocoabutter #vitamine #moisturizer #skincare #beauty #skinhealth #bodymoisturizer #saudiarabia

description_en:
**Palmers Cocoa Butter Cream 200 gm** is a rich cream containing pure cocoa butter and Vitamin E, specially formulated to soften and moisturize dry, rough skin. It helps to heal marks and scars and evens skin tone. Ideal for deep moisturization throughout the day and even overnight. Especially recommended for stretch marks during and after pregnancy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Cocoa Butter Cream 200 gm**: 
â­ Apply cream to the desired area twice daily in a circular motion. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Cocoa Butter Cream 200 gm**: 
â­ Pure Cocoa Butter
â­ Vitamin E

For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Hair Cream 250 gm**:

â­ Enriched with Vitamins A, D, and E.

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø±Ø² ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø³ÙˆÙØª ÙÙˆØ±Ù…ÙŠÙˆÙ„Ø§ 100 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**Palmers Cream Soft Formula 100 gm** is your go-to solution for taming frizz and achieving a sleek, shiny hairstyle. This cream's smooth texture helps you achieve a perfect look thanks to its rich formula of jojoba oil and Vitamin E. It nourishes, repairs damaged hair, and strengthens hair follicles, reducing hair fall and breakage.  It can be used on all hair types (dry, oily, combination) and even color-treated hair. Its light formula doesn't harden hair and washes out easily with a mild shampoo. The packaging is practical and travel-friendly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Cream Soft Formula 100 gm**:
â­ Wash and dry your hands before using the product.
â­ Apply a small amount to your hair, focusing on the ends when braiding.
â­ Use a hair tie to secure your hair.
â­ Apply a small amount to flyaway hairs to tame them.
â­ Wash your hair with a suitable shampoo to remove the product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Cream Soft Formula 100 gm**:
â­ Jojoba Oil
â­ Vitamin E

#Palmers #HairCream #HairStyling #SoftHair #HairCare #Beauty #HairProducts #YourBeauty #ShinyHair #KSA

description_en:
**Palmers Hair Cream Coconut 150 gm** is part of the renowned Palmer's skincare brand. Palmer's is known for its high-quality skincare products and is a trusted brand globally. **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut** is made with the finest ingredients and a superior formula. This cream is enriched with coconut oil, a natural way to grow hair faster, longer, and thicker. The coconut oil in this product is rich in vitamins and essential fatty acids that nourish the scalp while removing sebum buildup from hair follicles. Pamper your hair with its exotic fragrance and superior moisturizing properties for beautiful, strong, and shiny hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your palm and rub it into clean, dry hair.
â­ Distribute the cream evenly from scalp to ends.
â­ Do not rinse your hair immediately after application.
â­ For wet hair, towel dry before applying the cream.
â­ Style your hair as desired after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palmers Hair Cream Coconut**:
â­ Pure Coconut Oil
â­ Vitamin E

description_en:
**Palette ICC 8-1 Light Blonde Cendre Arab** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, Light Blonde Cendre hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palette ICC 8-1 Light Blonde Cendre Arab**:
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair for optimal color absorption.
â­ Put on gloves to protect your hands, then mix the dye according to the package instructions.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to your hair, starting from the roots and working your way to the ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated and use a comb for even distribution if necessary.
â­ Leave the color on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Follow with a conditioner to lock in moisture and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palette ICC 8-1 Light Blonde Cendre Arab**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.

**Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 1-1 Blue Black** delivers rich, deep blue-black color that lasts. â­Provides extra care during and after coloring with its formula enriched with keratin, panthenol, and nourishing oils. â­Intense, long-lasting color with 100% gray coverage. â­Strengthens and smooths hair for a beautiful, long-lasting color. â­Easy to use with clear instructions. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 1-1 Blue Black**: 
â­Do not wash your hair 24-48 hours before use. â­Wear the enclosed gloves. â­Mix the color creme with the developer thoroughly. â­Apply the mixture to dry hair, starting from the roots. â­Leave it for 30 minutes, then rinse well. â­Use the included care mask after rinsing.

title_en: **Palette PNC 8-16 Light Ash Blonde Hair Dye**
title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨ÙŠ Ø§Ù† Ø³ÙŠ 8-16Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± Ø±Ù…Ø§Ø¯ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­**
description_en:
**Palette PNC 8-16 Light Ash Blonde Hair Dye** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, Light Ash Blonde hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palette PNC 8-16 Light Ash Blonde Hair Dye**:
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair for optimal color absorption.
â­ Put on gloves to protect your hands, then mix the dye according to the package instructions.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to your hair, starting from the roots and working your way to the ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated and use a comb for even distribution if necessary.
â­ Leave the color on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Follow with a conditioner to lock in moisture and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palette PNC 8-16 Light Ash Blonde Hair Dye**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨ÙŠ Ø§Ù† Ø³ÙŠ 8-0 Ø£Ø´Ù‚Ø± ÙØ§ØªØ­**
description_en:
**Palette PNC 8-0 Light Blonde Arab** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, Light Blonde hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Palette PNC 8-0 Light Blonde Arab**:
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair for optimal color absorption.
â­ Put on gloves to protect your hands, then mix the dye according to the package instructions.
â­ Apply the mixture evenly to your hair, starting from the roots and working your way to the ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated and use a comb for even distribution if necessary.
â­ Leave the color on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear.
â­ Follow with a conditioner to lock in moisture and enhance shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Palette PNC 8-0 Light Blonde Arab**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.

**Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-88 Dark Red** delivers long-lasting, intense dark red hair color. â­ Intense and long-lasting color. â­ 100% grey coverage. â­ Enriched with Keratin, Panthenol, and nourishing oils for hair care. â­ Strengthens and smoothens hair. â­ Easy to use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-88 Dark Red**: 
â­ Do not wash your hair 24-48 hours before use. â­ Wear the enclosed gloves. â­ Mix the color creme with the developer thoroughly. â­ Apply the mixture to dry hair, starting from the back of the head. â­ Leave the mixture for 30 minutes. â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with warm water. â­ Use the enclosed care mask.

title_en: **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-60 Lustrous Med Brown**
title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ Ù…Ø®Ù…Ù„ÙŠ 4-60**
description_en:
**Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-60 Lustrous Med Brown** delivers long-lasting, intense color. Its rich formula with highly intensive pigments deeply penetrates the hair for anti-fade protection.  Achieve 100% gray coverage with color intensity that lasts for weeks. **Palette** strengthens, smoothens, and seals the hair for a beautiful, long-lasting color.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-60 Lustrous Med Brown**: 
â­ Do not wash your hair 24-48 hours before application.
â­ Wear the enclosed gloves.
â­ Mix the components thoroughly in a glass or porcelain bowl (do not use metal objects).
â­ Apply the mixture to dry hair, starting at the nape of the neck. Leave 2 cm at the roots.
â­ Leave the mixture for 30 minutes.
â­ Rinse your hair thoroughly with warm water.
â­ Use the included care mask.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Schwarzkopf Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-60 Lustrous Med Brown**: (Ingredients may vary, please check the package)
â­ Highly intensive hair pigments
â­ Keratin
â­ Panthenol
â­ Nutri-Oil

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠØª ØµØ¨ØºØ© Ø´Ø¹Ø± ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø¢ÙŠ Ø³ÙŠ Ø³ÙŠ 7-17 Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØ¬ Ù†Ø§Ø¹Ù…**
description_en:
**Pal Icc Color 7-17 Soft Brouge Mea** is a premium hair dye that delivers rich, vibrant color with a natural, radiant finish. Enriched with nourishing ingredients, it provides excellent gray coverage while leaving your hair feeling soft and manageable. Easy to apply, this formula is perfect for achieving a warm, soft brown hue that enhances your natural beauty and ensures long-lasting results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Pal Icc Color 7-17 Soft Brouge Mea**:
â­ Begin with dry, unwashed hair.
â­ Put on gloves, then mix the dye according to package instructions.
â­ Apply evenly to your hair, from roots to ends.
â­ Ensure all strands are coated, using a comb for even distribution.
â­ Leave on for the recommended time, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use a conditioner to lock in moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Pal Icc Color 7-17 Soft Brouge Mea**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Ethanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Hydroxide, P-Phenylenediamine, 4-Amino-2-Hydroxytoluene, Resorcinol, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid, 2-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One, 1-Methyl-2H-Isothiazol-3-One.
